price: (62) That is Allāh, your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: dhālikumu al-lahu rabbukum khāliqu kulli shayin lā ilāha illā huwa fa-annā tu'fakūna
